long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
‚ö†Ô∏è THIS EXTENSION IS NO LONGER SUPPORTED

If you are an AODocs user, we'll suggest you try the AODocs Smartbar for Google Workspace‚Ñ¢ extension: https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/aodocs-smartbar-for-googl/kedhimfmiceddmacbgnkpkilnjodoeim

Or, to edit files with your Microsoft Office suite directly from Google Drive‚Ñ¢, the AODocs Universal File Opener extension: https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/aodocs-universal-file-ope/kldfpiebhefepgbjknnlgpeichadmdib

----------------------------------------------------------------

AwesomeDrive‚Ñ¢ brings Microsoft Office‚Ñ¢ to your Google Drive‚Ñ¢

‚òÖ Creates new Microsoft Office files from the Google Drive NEW menu
‚òÖ No need to manually download your Microsoft Office files nor to upload them after editing
‚òÖ Just one click to open and edit your Microsoft Office files
‚òÖ Works with Microsoft Word, Excel and Powerpoint

----------------------------------------------------------------

‚úã REQUIREMENTS

‚úì Windows with Microsoft Office 2010, 2013 or 2016
or macOS with Microsoft Office 2011 or 2016
‚úì Microsoft Office files smaller than 32MB

----------------------------------------------------------------

üëΩ UNIVERSAL FILE OPENER

AwesomeDrive can be used in combination with our Universal File Opener‚Ñ¢ (UFO) extension to:

‚òÖ Open any type of file with your local software programs, edit and save them back to Google Drive
‚òÖ Work with old versions of Microsoft Office
‚òÖ Get rid of the 32MB file size limitation

UFO is currently available free of charge as a public beta version.
At the end of the beta period, AwesomeDrive users will have the option to purchase the UFO feature for a monthly fee.

Learn more: https://goo.gl/MMDrbM

----------------------------------------------------------------

üîí PERMISSIONS

The AwesomeDrive extension requires a set of permissions to be able to interact with your Google Drive.

‚û§ Read and change your data on drive.google.com
Allows to add entries in the NEW menu of your Google Drive pages to let you create new Microsoft Office files.
Allows to add a new action button, on hover, on your Google Drive items to let you edit them with your local software programs.

‚û§ Display notifications
Allows to create and show rich notifications in your system tray: only used to inform you in case of errors during the authentication flow.

‚û§ Communicate with cooperating websites
Allows our OAuth2 authentication web page to securely connect to the extension (send messages to the extension and get answers from it).

----------------------------------------------------------------

üôã SUPPORT

AwesomeDrive is provided for free but we will be happy to help you if you encounter any problem.
You can reach us via our Facebook community page at https://www.facebook.com/AwesomeDrive-Community-812265129132888

Thanks for reading! We hope you will enjoy the AwesomeDrive extension!
